text:
FBI agents descended on Paul Manafort
Alexandria Virginia apartment in an

unannounced pre-dawn raids late last
month according to the Washington Post

it unfolded in the early morning hours
July 26th with agents using financial

and tax records among other documents
the rate appears to be unusual since

mana Ford has repeatedly claimed he is
cooperating and it marks the significant

steps in special counsel Robert Muller's
Russia investigation the FBI agents

working for Special Counsel Muller
believed that he is hiding something and

that they conducted their search in the
early morning as is normal for them so

that the individual whose residence it
is has no opportunity to destroy or

otherwise tamper with the evidence that
they seek mana Ford stepped down as

Trump campaign chair last August as
questions about Russia's involvement in

the election intensified are there any
ties between mr. Trump you or your

campaign and Putin and his regime know
if there are not it's absurd and there's

no basis to it but cNN has learned
investigators have become suspicious of

Manta Ford after they turned up
intercepted communications from

suspected Russian operatives discussing
Russian efforts to work with Manta fort

to gather information that could hurt
Hillary Clinton's bid for the White

House according to US officials mana
Ford's attendance at a June 2016 trunk

tower meeting with Donald Trump jr.
Jared Kushner and a Russian lawyer has

also piqued the interest of federal
investigators during the campaign manif

or denied working with the Russian why
is it so far-fetched to blame the

Russians and say that the motive was to
help you it's just absurd agents raided

Manta Ford's home one day after he met
behind closed doors with the Senate

Intelligence Committee and CNN is told
Manafort turned in approximately 400

pages to the Senate Judiciary Committee
on August 2nd many of those documents

pertain to Manta forts retro actively
registering as a foreign agent at the

end of June investigators are
scrutinizing Men affords tax and

business records to determine whether
any criminal violation may have occurred

Muller's former Special Counsel the
Justice Department says if there's

evidence of other crimes committed by
men afford it could be leveraged for the

special counsel
convinced metaphor to cooperate if you

can obtain charges that are viable
against them on something collateral to

that then you can use that as leverage
to strike a deal with respect to the

type of evidence that you want with
respect to the heart of your matter in
this case the collusion
